title: Paradise Hotel: Efter Festen
overview: How is life really like PH-star? In the new venture, Paradise Hotel: Efter Festen, viewers get a deeper insight into the PH stars' lives after Paradise Hotel has been broadcast. We get in the series following some of the most popular participants from this year's season at home: Paulina "Paow" Danielsson, Marcus "Mcuze" Johansson, Emma Hellström, Arvid Stenbäcken, Gabriella "Bella" Andersson and Jesper Bengtsson.
